text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with how to make horseradish sauce
you know it actually makes me sad when i
see people buying horseradish sauce in a
supermarket I mean you look on those
labels I'll have like 20 ingredients and
it really shouldn't take that many it's
a simple recipe not to mention the
homemade is gonna come out so much
better tasting and I'm sure less
expensive so let me show you how to put
this together alright we're gonna start
with some sour cream or somebody called
creme fraiche which is like really good
sour cream if you can't find creme
fraiche that's fine sour cream is
actually the traditional ingredient used
in this alright next a tiny splash of
fresh lemon juice this is a little bit
controversial purists say there is no
lemon juice in horseradish sauce so just
a little bit adds to the Tang eNOS for
me alright but it's optional so if you
don't like it don't use it or you could
substitute a little tiny splash of white
vinegar some beautiful fresh chopped
chives a little bit of cayenne and then
of course extra hot horseradish alright
so make sure when you're buying your
horseradish you're not accidentally
buying a horseradish sauce it should
just be pure grated horseradish alright
we're gonna give that a mix and believe
it or not that's it now this is fine to
use right now but it would taste better
if you let it age for a couple hours in
the fridge all those flavors will kind
of meld together that horseradish flavor
will kind of permeate the sauce a little
more than if you just use it right away
so try to make it ahead of time if you
can and then that's it
million things to use this on my
favorite of course juicy rare roast beef
you can't beat it so if you're doing a
prime rib around the holidays make up a
batch of this this is also amazing
spread on some crusty rolls for roast
beef sandwiches so good and makes me
surprisingly good dipping sauce for
fresh vegetables anyway just a quick
simple demo how to make horseradish
sauce I hope you give it a try all the
ingredients are on the site as usual and
as always enjoy
you
